;Anti-wrinkle creams are specially formulated creams aimed at lowering and getting rid of wrinkles, commonly from the experience. As men and women age, their skin tends to type wrinkles in locations where by the skin is prone to stretching or folding. As skin cells get older and lose their elasticity, they form wrinkles a lot more quickly, and these wrinkles eventually turn into permanent. Anti-wrinkle creams are formulated to stop this method and to reverse its consequences.
;
